subject: Re: Jeffrey Epstein Jeffrey Epstein is currently housed at MCC New York and not in a local hospital as has been reported. As with all inmates, for privacy and security reasons, we do not share information on an inmate's medical status or their conditions of confinement. Thanks Office of Public Affairs Information, Policy and Public Affairs Division Federal Bureau of Prisons (202) 514-6551 - phone (202) 514-6620 - fax >> EE 2h ecailybeast. com> 7/25/2019 9:44 AM >>> Hello, Reaching out about reports that Jeffrey Epstein tried to kill himself in prison/was injured in someway. ae oe writer The Daily Beast M: 267-257 {ie Facebook, Twitter, Instagram: CPOCMO  DOJ-OGR-00023528
body:
Jeffrey Epstein is currently housed at MCC New York and not in a local hospital as has been reported. As with all inmates, for privacy
and security reasons, we do not share information on an inmate's medical status or their conditions of confinement.
Thanks
Office of Public Affairs
Information, Policy and Public Affairs Division
Federal Bureau of Prisons
(202) 514-6551 - phone
(202) 514-6620 - fax
>> EE 2h ecailybeast. com> 7/25/2019 9:44 AM >>>
Hello,
Reaching out about reports that Jeffrey Epstein tried to kill himself in prison/was injured in someway.
